subject: Implement CLI Tool
description:
Create standalone CLI tool at /home/ken/nextmavens-cli/:
1. Node.js CLI package with oclif or yargs
2. Commands: login, project create, project link, db push, functions deploy, secrets set, status
3. Wrapper around Control Plane API
4. Config storage in .nextmavens/config.json
5. Reuse auth tokens from developer portal
6. Distribute via npm
7. Add installation and usage documentation

CLI is critical for serious developer adoption and enables automation/CI/CD.
